articles.title: India among top 3 countries with highest cancer cases, deaths in Asia: Study - Daijiworld.com
articles.description:
New Delhi, Jan 4 (IANS): China, India, and Japan are the three leading countries in Asia in terms of the number of new cancer cases, deaths and disability-adjusted life years (DALYs), according to a study.
The findings, published in the journal The Lancet Re…
